attributes.action: Investigate the biased nature in which the Hull Daily Mail publishes stories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For example the recent articles regarding clamping in Hull or more precisely the band wagon which the Hull Daily Mail has jumped on to persecute one person for protecting other peoples property! Even if you dissagree with this story think about past stories to which you only hear one side of the story! A reporter called Adam told me "it sells papers", is this the kind of local information publication we really want; just bothered about making money not reporting the facts!?
Stop letting them get away with it and lets have a change of press for our great City!!

rejection.details: Please visit the Press Complaints Commission: www.pcc.org.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
